abstract: Milwaukee Brewers defeat Arizona Diamondbacks, 4-1, to take 1-0 lead in National League division series.
snippet: Prince Fielder doubled to set up a run in the fourth, then lined a two-run homer to right in the seventh inning to punctuate Milwaukee’s 4-1 victory over Arizona in an N.L. division series.
lead_paragraph: Prince Fielder doubled to set up a run in the fourth, then lined a two-run homer to right in the seventh inning to punctuate Milwaukee’s 4-1 victory over Arizona in an N.L. division series.

headline.main: Diamondbacks Pitch to the Brewers’ Fielder, and He Makes Them Pay in Opener
headline.print_headline: Diamondbacks Pitch to the Brewers’ Fielder, and He Makes Them Pay in Opener
headline.seo: N.L. Division Series: Fielder’s Homer Leads Brewers Over Diamondbacks
